1.content:
Animal of choice

The animal you turn in to must be native or common to the area or region you live in.

If a kind of animal has many breeds, ie. dogs cows birds, it is just whatever the main species is unless there is a huge difference like its a wolf, horned, or its a large bird of prey instead of a common robin.

The abilities of the animal are mainly the physical abilities and senses. For the examples above a dog gives you its sense of smell, hearing, endurance, teeth and claws,and, from a wolf, its ability to stay warm. A cow will give you its sense of smell , hearing, horns, power of inertia, and from a ow like the scottish highlander, its ability to survive on very little sustenance. And form a bird, its eyesight, talons, hollow bones, and, from birds like owls, its ability to move without making noise. You can choose any number of these abilities at a time.
1.title: A good base is a good start

choices: cammale (obviously this is is the middle east)
15.content: How 'bout these? I 'ot sum purdy ones 'ere.
15.title: other

info.brief_description: You are a Changeling, a person capable of changing into any one animal.GP&reviews of yours
info.description:
You are a Changeling, a person capable of changing into any one animal. In addition to that you can call on the abilities of that animal as well as others of that animal if they are close to you.

Rules:
While there is nudity(clothes don't change with you) this is not a sexual story, no sex, no masturbation, no "playing with yourself."(The only exception is if that animal does the action normally Ex. two dogs sniff each others butts in greeting.)

The main character must not died until later in the story, after a suitable replacement has been introduced and brought up. Other characters can be introduced and killed much sooner

No ending the story without possible continue options.

GPs for chapters I don't have to edit majorly. My "c v x" keys do not work so I generally have to copy them from somewhere else. This is a pain so I hope to not have to do it too often.

Reviews will be done for items of yours if you add decent chapters or request them in the new chapter's title.

ENJOY!!!!!!
